September 1980: The New Usuyuki Story

Plays:

The New Usuyuki Story (新薄雪物語)

The Cherry-Viewing (地主権現花見)

The Kiyomizu Temple (清水寺)

The Messenger Shibukawa (渋川使者)

The Consultation (評議)

Sonobe's House (園部屋敷)

The Blacksmith Shop (鍛冶屋)

Magaki (腰元籬)
